price: Kuni (isaaniif) faaruudha. Isaan Rabbiin sodaataniif deebii gaariitu jira.
arabic: هَٰذَا ذِكۡرٞۚ وَإِنَّ لِلۡمُتَّقِينَ لَحُسۡنَ مَـَٔابٖ

version.title: Oromo translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Oromo by Ghaly Ababour Abaghuna, printed in 2009.

meta.transliteration: hādhā dhik'run wa-inna lil'muttaqīna laḥus'na maābin
